SEARCH
Package FinalInterTeamServices.FOH

Class FOHDataAccessor

java.lang.Object
FinalInterTeamServices.FOH.FOHDataAccessor
All Implemented Interfaces:
FOHFinalInterface
public class FOHDataAccessor extends Object implements FOHFinalInterface
The FOHDataAccessor class provides methods to access and retrieve data related to Font-of-House (FOH) operations from our team's database with only user privileges.
